website_summaries.verdict: Includes two batteries for excellent battery life in an action cam. Desirable price point for waterproof camera.
pros: Offers waterproof capabilities up to 100 feet deep
4K video recording at 25 frames per second
Very easy to use for simple action video and photos
cons: Limited to 12 megapixels of resolution for still image photography

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't waste my money
customer_reviews.text: We haven't even had the camera a full 6 months and the video window on the back of the camera has a line running through it. I wouldn't waste my money. Can't return it and a warranty wasn't offered. So, now we are out the money and no camera. I would go ahead and purchase the go pro.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a Go Pro for a while now but the price are just not in my budget. I searched and searched and I am so glad I stumbled upon this product. It is small, comes with a lot of accessories, wifi connected, waterproof, great image quality. I could not ask for more. This is my ever first sports action camera. I will be taking this to my trip to the Philippines. Many beaches and islands to go to and i cannot wait to use this. I feel like a little kid using this and showing my husband what it can do. Definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Darlyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Considering that I bought this for an 11 yr. old and the 6 yr. old is now the cameraman, I cannot be more pleased. The picture quality is excellent, even when the younger is bouncing around while filming the basketball player. Using the camera on his bike and skateboard also pise challenges, but despite our rough roads, the film is clear, albeit a bit goofy. We are very happy with the battery life, ease of uploading, and waterproof quality during storms. Great purchase and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rados

customer_reviews.title: Arrived scratched !
customer_reviews.text: Received item and waterproof casing was scratched both on the lens and the screen. It almost looked like it was used. I did turn on camera to see if I liked the quality to re- purchased. Quality seemed ok. After doing some research I found much better brands that are comparable to the new go pro that I decided to purchase instead. Not to mention I didn't like how they offer a gift for 5 star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical, but the pictures are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces immediately stole this from me and took crazy water videos. They are gorgeous - and obviously, it means the equipment is not only easy to set up, but easy to use. It has more attachments than I know what to do with - I am just so happy that I didn't purchase a much more expensive model when this is absolutely beautiful quality for a fraction of the price. I did laugh at the warning that when it's in the case the volume may not be heard (I'm wondering how many people complained) - but the case perfectly protects against water issues.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great -- while it lasted.  :-(
customer_reviews.text: This quite a lot of camera for the money. However, there is one glaring problem: The adhesive on the helmet mount! Because of that, the camera lasted less than one day for me. The camera fell off somewhere in Yosemite, leaving only a thin layer of the adhesive in its place. Great video lost forever. I have old helmets with GoPro mounts still adhered to them. They're next to impossible to remove. This adhesive though, is an otherwise great product's Achilles heel. UPDATE: Although I did not expect it, Akaso replaced the camera! That changes everything. Aside from the adhesive, this is a GREAT camera. I'm changing my review from one star to five.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rey

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking “the image quality can’t be that bad, right?”. IT’S BAD!!! Highly pixelated, even at the highest resolution and definitely not to a modern standard for digital cameras. The best way to describe the image quality is it looks like it’s using 1990’s technology. It’s my fault for being cheap. Save your money and buy a GoPro. If you have valuable memories that you want to cherish, forget this camera.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Really good budget camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera did almost everything that I was hoping for. Crisp video and photos. The waterproof case worked flawlessly. There are some downsides though. The audio sucks. Hardly worth calling it audio recording at all. If you do not have video editing software, don't bother with the time delay as well. Unlike most smart phones that stitch the individual images back together, the camera saves them as individual files. No big deal if you know what you're doing, but for a novice this might be challenging. If this camera broke, would I buy it again. Absolutely. Are you getting all the features of the latest GoPro. Not for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Yurgal

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera. Very affordable and excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: OK for it’s price but awkward to use underwater as it’s practically impossible to see if it’s recording or not. Recording light indicator should be AMUST feature on the next version. Remote was not working out of a package. I had no time to check if it’s a battery or something else. Should be working or don’t market it as a feature!!! :(. Overall iffy quality but hopefully will last for couple of vacations although not much faith in the product. Update on 11/12/2018 I have received a free replacement which was unexpected and more than welcomed. I have used the camera for about a year now and happy with it’s overall performance and quality.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product but it is not intuitive. Honestly, it is a pain to use and after about five float trips, I still do not have good pictures with this product. It shoots video when I want pictures and it does not review pictures easily. The case was cheap and broke easily. I have a hard time getting the battery case open and getting the memory card out. I got a new case and that case the power button was at the bottom of the case instead of like mine at the top. I don't love this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: jsco

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for low price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for the past month, and it is such a good camera for the price. The picture quality is good and it takes very smooth videos. The camera's build quality could be better, but the case provides plenty of protection. The camera comes with many different attachments and is versatile for any outdoor activity. I plan to take this camera with me whenever I go out, I am very satisfied with this action camera.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great Action Camera at Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I am quite impressed with this product at this price. Everything worked fine out of the box. Camera was packaged nicely and I found it easy to setup. Includes all the accessories I can imagine needing, with the handlebar clamp being the one I anticipate using the most. It's nice that they give you two batteries as well. So far, used it only around the house to practice but I am looking forward to taking it on the road (and off). Will update the review after I have had some more experience with it, but my first impression is that this is a great alternative for those who don't want to spend $400 for the name brand action camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mike, Rodeo CA

customer_reviews.title: Good action camera with a serious shortcoming for SCUBA divers
customer_reviews.text: It's early in my experience with the camera. Pros: seems to be a good camera at a good price that's compatible with GoPro cams. Comes with a bunch of mounting options and remote control. Cons: No chest strap. There is no add on filter capability. This is a serious shortcoming and one the manufacturer should address. This is odd for a camera that is listed as suitable for SCUBA. You must have a filter underwater to get decent colors. I would also like to add a polarized filter for daylight. Other reviewers have come up with workarounds for retrofitting scuba filters.
customer_reviews.author: TheMatrix

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at this little camera
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd make a ton of compromises with this camera being so much cheaper than the similar GoPro but it wasn't as much as I thought. The drawbacks: 1) It doesn't pick up audio well. 2) Battery doesn't last as long. Probably why you get two. 3) Body of camera feels cheap. 4) Options menu is clunky. Thats it. The image quality is awesome. The accessories are great. Overall I am very happy about the purchase. You will be too.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Simpson

customer_reviews.title: DEAD REMOTE?
customer_reviews.text: AKASO is impossible to reach. No response to emails and the phone system is a pre-set loop that basically forces you to hold on for 1 to 2 minutes so it can tell you to email and then beep for a message. Literally NEVER in. Not sure what's actually going on with the manufacturer, because when you call "Akaso" it's a company called Tablet Express who is non-reachable. Sad because I really wanted to keep and like this camera. Back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: QueenOAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Battery exploded. Camera ruined.
customer_reviews.text: battery exploded in camera while I was charging for the first time. Camera is ruined. Very unfortunate that this happened on Christmas Eve and was suppose to be a Christmas present for my son.
customer_reviews.author: TLR

customer_reviews.title: Company stands by their product and sent a replacement
customer_reviews.text: We had this camera in its waterproof case. It should be safe to 100ft per the description. We were snorkeling, so at max, it was 10-15ft deep depending on the dive down. The case leaked and flooded after about 15 minutes and the camera doesn’t work at all now. *update* replacement camera was sent. So far the new camera is working well. It did fine with skiing and with random kid activities throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: 4monkeymomma

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This camera is nice. Good quality and comes with alot of accessories. Definitely worth every penny. If you don't like over-spending on big name products, this is for you. Don't get ripped off, buy something like this. UPDATE: After more than a year of owning this camera and also buying a similar camera (different brand), I can say that this camera is the best at its price. If I were you I'd buy it. Also, if anyone is interested as using this as a computer camera/ webcam: - Remove SD card (and battery so you won't ruin it) - plug into computer using the usb cable ("pc camera" should appear on scream) - change settings on desired program
customer_reviews.author: LFCfan

customer_reviews.title: 100 percent love this item!
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeds my expectations. I couldn’t imagine even considering to buy the GoPro after buying this camera. Great price. Even better value. The image quality is awesome. The accessories were a little hard to figure out at first but after messing with it I have no problems! I’m so excited to take this on vacation with me!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Big advantage is the built-in monitor
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent camera. Comparing it to the GoPro, the big advantage is that it has a built-in monitor, which is another impressive feature / savings. You have to buy the monitor separately for the GoPro - and it makes the camera deeper / heavier. The only downside is that 4K recording is not at full frame rate. Other than that, it's a really decent and light weight camera. It comes with a lot of useful adapters. The housing and mounting systems are similar to the GoPro. In fact, the mounting system is compatible with the GoPro
customer_reviews.author: Warren Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: I have cameras in all my vehicles, and worked as a professional photographer so I know how to operate cameras. This is a decent camera, for the price feature packed; but it does not video loop! I have a 32 gig micro sd class 10 card and the menu field has on/off but it stays grayed out and will not allow you to turn it on. I’ve had problems with turning it on at times also. Field of view is good, decent pictures, good video. The batteries fair, well packaged, lots of accessories for mountings, well packaged. I’d give it 5 stars if it would loop the video so I wouldn’t have to format so often.
customer_reviews.author: RLB DAB

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd camera and I'm very happy with both of them. I have them mounted on my motorcycle helmets and it works great. The remote control feature is very helpful while riding, the picture quality is excellent I also own a GoPro and I mostly use this camera, can't tell the difference most of the times. I will buy a third one to mount on my other bike soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only worked a few times
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a few times and it quit holding a charge. Waited too long to take advantage of returning or warranty so just wasted the money. Finally contacted the manufacturer and they wouldn’t do anything. Thought it was a good price for something with such good reviews but quit working pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: AZtoCALI

customer_reviews.title: The AKASO 4k is a great camera at a fraction of the cost!!!
customer_reviews.text: Both image and video quality of the AKASO 4K are comparable to GoPro, but the image stabilization is better compared to my son's GoPro when capturing dirt bike action and at a fraction of the cost. I have not tested the waterproof feature of this camera, but the enclosure looks sturdy and the seals are comparable to what you would find on any waterproof phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Quickon2

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old wanted a GoPro, but decided to buy this after doing her research (for months). The price was WAY better (considering she had to pay for it herself) and the quality is awesome! True to a ten year old, she immediately dunked it under the faucet and in the pool. She was thrilled with the picture quality and all of the attachments. You need to purchase a MICRO memory card for this product (it doesn't come with it). Perfect for adventurous people! Great camera and very compatible to the GoPro. She can't wait to take it surfing with her this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree A. Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Video quality was good but pro list ends there. Controls are buggy, laggy. It gets hung up at random points. Apparently videos can’t be recorded in longer than 1 minute segments even with fully charged battery and 64GB card. Camera quit after 7 consecutive 1 minute videos. I don’t know what’s wrong with mine because of all these other positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Invaluable

customer_reviews.title: Good decent action cam
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used her cell phone to record as she skied downhill. I purchased this for her so she doesn't have excuse to do cell phone again. As I have no previous action cam to compare, I can only judge base on what I see. Compare to footage from iPhone 6S, the video quality is definitely smoother and higher pixels. I am sure some may have experienced another better action cam and tell me otherwise; but for the price of this action cam (compares to an iPhone 6S), I don't have any regret of this purchase. Attached is a short footage for anyone curious to make his/her judgement.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good camera kit for the money, You get what you pay for :)
customer_reviews.text: Item as advertised 2 batteries 1 wont hold a charge for more than 30 minutes The other is fine I used it several times and followed all instructions in the pamphlet and online manual Amazon is supposed to contact the vendor for me I buy with confidence in Amazon Prime I hope this is resolved quickly
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nino

customer_reviews.title: Company reached out to me and fixed the issue
customer_reviews.text: I just received my AKASO I charged the battery before using turned it on and did a test... Well the battery warning light came on and it shut down. I checked my sd card and it didn't even record anything. I put the other battery in and it did the same, only this time it recorded half of what I thought I was recording... I guess you get what you pay for, I will be returning this... Update**** Customer service reached out to me and gave me a few options to resolve my issue. They were very prompt and very professional in meeting my needs. At this point I will order again..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: must buy! Just as good as the name brand
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a present for my nine-year-old son and he loves it. He wanted a go pro but for the price of a go pro and his age I wanted to try something else out and this was amazing! I got this product because it was inexpensive and had great reviews. I am pleasantly surprised, it’s amazing And the quality is comparable to some of the name brands
customer_reviews.author: Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: This is not a high-quality camera, but under the right conditions it could serve your purposes. Requires a good bit of light to see anything well, and isnt so good at close-up shooting. However, compared to most, this thing is dirt cheap, and the accessories it comes with are GoPro compatible and decent quality. Those alone would cost you around 40 bucks. Not worth it to me, as I needed a camera that was reliable up close (about 12 inches) other than that it's a good deal for the price, just wont get you far if you're serious about whatever it is you're using it for.
customer_reviews.author: NB Art

customer_reviews.title: Lens wasn't scratched (but it looked like it)
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a bunch of different mounts, which I haven't yet figured out. Don't forget to order a memory card, if you want to start using it right away. As a side note, it looked like the outer lens protector was scratched when it arrived, but it was just a protective film, which (with no tab sticking out) was not obvious nor super easy to remove. Will update after i get a memory card, and get some use in.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tenorio

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: I've had the camera less than 6 months, used it carefully maybe 4 times and now it doesn't work. I turn it on and the screen is totally white. I have turned it off and on, replaced the batteries and still get the same result. I am very disappointed and would never recommend it. Do yourself a favor and buy a camera that works.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money! Excellent image quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great operating camera! Tons of accessories that cover all your mounting needs. Quality of images and video is perfect. Quality materials used for camera are not the best. Materials used are plastic and not aluminum or better as on the much costlier options. Even includes 2.4 Ghz radio remote for start of recording video or capturing photos. Also has "time lapse" mode and continuous burst mode for high speed sports capture. This camera and accessories show 4 to 5 years of minimum durability. Great buy! Will purchase again! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Stedyone

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the video is great. The only down side is I didn't realize ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife and she loves it. She is able to quickly capture videos of our 15 month old daughter and has even agreed to let me borrow it on my ski trip next month. The quality of the video is great. The only down side is I didn't realize it didn't come with a micro SD card so we had to get one before we could use the camera. Overall she is very happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Super Camera Super Value
customer_reviews.text: I was interested in a go pro but a friend recommended this camera and I couldn’t be more satisfied. It does everything I need and performs very well. A great camera at a super value. You should get this camera if you want quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: B. E. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little camera at a fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a GoPro, so I can't compare. What I can say is that this is an easy set-up and an awesome camera. I use it to film myself checking my beehives. It allows me to go back and look for things I couldn't see in the moment. It also is great for reviewing footage as I'm making my inspection notes. The quality of the picture and the length of recording are great. I bought a micro SD card for 4K video from my local warehouse store for $10 and it works great. I plan to take it on my hiking trip to the Rocky Mountains this year.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok... but a better camera is worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Camera is ok for price. Quality isn’t all that great. The sound is muffled by the case so don’t bother thinking you’ll get anything useful from audio. Also, it overheats VERY fast and shuts off after 20 minutes of recording. I did follow the SD card size specifications and it still overheated. Not too happy with it. I should have just bought the gopro instead. Really disappointed because this was for my kids youtube channel. I can't even use it. back to iPhone I guess.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband who is an avid skateboarder. He was very happy with it. Although he did have to purchase a few extra main attachments he needed, and he mentioned that that battery does not last as long as he would like.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cook

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but it's not perfect either.
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely no gopro. Overall, it's functional, but there are flaws: - The system software is incredibly buggy; it tends to lock up when navigating the menus, thus requiring the battery to be pulled to reset it - The buttons on the side sometimes fail to provide feedback (the "click" when pressed) - The camera always defaults to video mode during startup, instead of either last-used (e.g. still camera mode), or being able to configure the startup mode permanently. - The exposure control is really bad - I had to constantly manage a +/- 1-1.5 stop in various lighting conditions through the controls whereas my friend's GoPro handled the conditions automatically.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Just understand what you're paying for
customer_reviews.text: I got this for $55, so knowing that I'd say the quality is about $55 worth of picture quality. That is to say, it's awful. But as long as you know that going in and have a proper use for a throwaway camera then it's fine. I'm confused by all these other reviews raving about the image quality, because it's not even close to a GoPro but I will say it's nice that you get a whole assortment of accessories. It's a good camera for putting into dangerous situations as a crash cam knowing that it'll likely get destroyed. But don't buy it thinking it'll be good for capturing precious memories.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: GO FOR IT !
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a total bang for the bill, nothing to envy to expensive brands. It’s well made, light, simple to set and use. It’s perfect for to catch memories from my kids activities and also for my city-mountain biking trips. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Lopez Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Takes great video!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an introductory level camera for filming wildlife in the backyard up close. Exceeded my expectations! I am able to clip the camera to the bird feeder and get amazing results! Love the camera. Much cheaper than a GoPro and great quality. Can film up to 4K. It breaks the clips into 10 minute chunks which is good for me with editing and splicing. Also I bought a 128G card and put in it. It says supports up to 32G but the 128 is working great! Would recommend for sure! P.S. Amazon review page scales down the video quite a bit. It really looks super crisp in reality!
customer_reviews.author: Jill & Roger

customer_reviews.title: Just as good or better then my old Go Pro
customer_reviews.text: Just recently bought this camera and find it to be beyond a great value for its quality . I had a Go Pro for a few years and found it to be a good camera, recently I had my car broken into and it was stolen and didn't want to pay the big buck$$ so I read so many good reviews on the Akaso I had to buy and try and love this camera so far I also love all the great accessories that comes with it . Especially the extra battery . Easy to use and beyond a value for the cost. A complete no brained. Happy customer from Newport Beach Ca.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Villa

customer_reviews.title: A starter for action camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st action camera. It comes with a lot of accessories. I only need this camera in outdoor activities. The pictures looks nice. The video is clear. Compared to the expensive GoPro, this camera is good for a beginner with a good quality and reasonable price/
customer_reviews.author: W. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Good video for price; pictures not so much
customer_reviews.text: Works great for it's price point. Video quality is good; picture quality is similar to a cheap cell phone camera at best. So for general pictures better off using something else like a good cell phone camera or a traditional camera. Sound quality on video was decent for the price
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got the camera this week and everything looks good. I took several pics and videos with it. I was a little disappointed it only supports 32 Gig (according to the instructions), I have a 128 gig in it and it seems to work, have to wait and see if it actually does. I was a little hesitant about the iPhone app when i first downloaded it but it actually worked pretty good, butter than the Nikon app for another camera I have.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not 4K; very disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: This action camera does the job, but a very poor job. It actually doesn't even support the claim of being able to record in 4K. The 4K videos are unbearably choppy and it seems like the camera freezes whenever it's in 4K mode. I didn't expect much from this purchase, but whenever a seller claims certain abilities for a product and that's proven to be completely false upon purchasing the product, I think that's extremely unprofessional and a waste of consumers' money. However, if you want a very basic-functioning, cheap action camera that does a minimal job, then this might be a good buy. Just don't expect it to have 4K abilities or be super durable.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised - great value
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this camera for about 2 months. Compared to other name brand products (GoPro) this unit is a great value. -BUT- If I had a "do-over" I wouldn't buy this again because selfies are impossible (I have become too accustomed to a forward facing screen). Also I am afraid to use the remote in water because I cannot confirm that it is waterproof or even water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: kwm1970

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Product came broken in box. Sent in for refund and ordered another. Hoped it was just a fluke it was broke. Yep new one came in just fine. Works great. Brother ordered one just like it. He films it on his sons race car! We dive with ours and they work great! Suck it GO PRO! 1/3 the price and same product, even uses go pro cases and attachments.
customer_reviews.author: flash 41

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed after reading all the good reviews on amazon and ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the camera and everything they promised was there, but when I used the camera the screen was red. I was disappointed after reading all the good reviews on amazon and all the great videos on you tube. The picture was clear, but it had a red tint to everything. I tried taking out the battery and putting it back in and had no luck. Other than that the function of the camera was easy to use and understand and all the extra stuff you get was great. I may have been the unlucky person to get a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this “waterproof” camera
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this camera after reading others reviews but on our third dive the cheaply constructed waterproof casing broke on our dive. This of course ruined the camera, battery and SD. I am additionally disappointed in Amazon’s response when the 30 day return date was 5 days ago and when we arrived back in Texas yesterday from our trip their response was contact the manufacturer. I knew we should have purchased a GoPro. Don’t go cheap buy a GoPro and stop reading these reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Carri Eddy

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing little camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for our Facebook live production of our church services. I am a pastor in a small community and many of our shut-ins were not able to attend our services. With this camera, the quality of the Facebook live production has gone up significantly. The wide-angle on the lens has also been a great advantage. This works much better than my current cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: David Combs

customer_reviews.title: Good cam but eats batteries
customer_reviews.text: *update* well since the last app update, the cam is useless. Can't use it for what I need now. Keep getting errors trying to connect. See picture. Good camera. I used i over the weekend to film my sons lacrosse games. I could use a zoom, but this camera is not ment for what i needed it to do. I will say that it BURNS through BATTERIES. I got about 30 min per battery. Glad I ordered 3 extra.
customer_reviews.author: BigMikeLV

customer_reviews.title: Wifi isnt too great.
customer_reviews.text: Just letting you know I'm not a professional in inspecting the quality of cameras. Since I have never used really good ones aside cheap ones. This camera works exactly as it should. It's just that the wifi doesnt work as described in the description. Other than that, no problems at all!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality are fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sports camera because it was affordable and has solid quality hardware and accessories. I didn't want to get something too expensive because this will be my first camera of this type. My intention was to use it as a practice camera for when i really understood the best techniques for recording and keeping the camera secure from damage. After getting familiar with the camera i dont see myself buying another one for quite some time as this one here is perfect for all the recordings i plan to do. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: kevin pereira

customer_reviews.title: The camera is GREAT! The pictures whether outside or under water are ...
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this camera for a Cruise, based on the advice of others. The camera is GREAT! The pictures whether outside or under water are stunning. Videos are nice too. The only downside that I've found, is that the remote is not waterproof, tried to use it while snorkeling in 4' of water, the remote would not work and now it won't work at all. I took it apart, and although it looks as if there was an attempt to make it waterproof (rubber seals, etc...) it most definitely got water in it and corroded everything. On that note, does anyone know of a waterproof remote that will work with this camera?
customer_reviews.author: BradH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and features
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, have only had a chance to use it once so far. Bought it for an upcoming dive trip to Belize, can hardly wait to try the waterproof video and pictures. Love the 'burst photo' option, as I am not a great photographer and tend to 'miss the perfect shot', and this allows me to have more chances to catch what I'm going for. I am curious as to how long the battery will last, and will update further. Great price, bought it as GoPro is too expensive. I hope to use it while zip-lining, horseback riding, and diving, as well as just sightseeing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This camera is to replace a vtech camera that I got my daughter for her birthday, which quit working on the first use. She wants this for her YouTube videos of herself and her toys 🙄. The camera seems great so far. Nice videos and pictures. We have not yet tested the water resistance so I could not rate that part. All the accessories that were included were really cool and she has been trying it out mounted to her bike, the car, etc. I recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Gaytan

customer_reviews.title: No go
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item. The buttons were tricky to use. The picture quality was not good at all. When I opened the box there was a coupon that provided extra accessories in exchange for a 5 star review. Sooo take that into account when reading all of the glowing reviews. Also there is no way to connect to WiFi. Really frustrating and a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: W Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Excellent video!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value. Did some video and the quality is excellent. Camera is simple to use and very small and light! Lots of attachments as well. Unpacking everything was really fun. I'll be using this to video a road trip, so the remote will come in very handy. I did have a problem with the supplied USB cable, however the company responded quickly to my email. Very please, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Craftsman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, quality is better than expected. Pictures are clear and crisp and all of the accessories are pretty cool as an added bonus. I bought a few extra batteries too and they were not very expensive. I am looking forward to trying out some of the other accessories. Menus are easy to navigate, it only took me a few minutes to figure out what all of the buttons do. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: eblak3

customer_reviews.title: Best Birthday Gift Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our son who is extremely active and really into video/photography. He used this camera to get action video and swimming video and we're EXTREMELY pleased at the results! Clear picture, great audio, and it does great under water. Our son was able to use the camera easily, which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome and comes with a what I consider more than ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used a Go-Pro because I've always felt they are ridiculously overpriced so I can't make a direct comparison. After after using this camera, my feelings have been confirmed. This thing is awesome and comes with a what I consider more than just a starter kit of accessories and a spare battery. The specs state a max capacity of 32gb micro-SD but I've found absolutely no issue with using a 64gb card. Audio recording is what you would expect - not great but it gets the job done. I will be buying a couple more of these without hesitation! Buy it...you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work the first time out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this unit for less than a month, I’ve used it one time... sort of. I attempted to make a time lapse video of a project I was doing and the time lapse function isn’t able to be selected in the set up menu. Also, when you select “time lapse” on the mode and begin your recording, the screen freezes and nothing works. Holding the power button is the only way to make anything happen and the screen turns green and purple at this time. Terrible experience, buy a go pro.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Identical to popular brand, fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Camera looks and functions like the more expensive brand. Kit came with all the mounting hardware, adhesives, and protective shell. Kids love it on their ski helmets, and surfboards. I love it because it was less than $100 if broken, lost or stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for capturing fishing adventures on muddy river banks
customer_reviews.text: The video was pretty clear, I've only used it a few times but the video was nicer than the other action cam I bought on Amazon for a similar price. The case is definitely waterproof as advertised. I use this to capture my catches in mud rivers.
customer_reviews.author: Asa

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Camera, You’ll Be Glad You Did!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this camera!!! We have had a blast using it for downhill skiing, water skiing and everything in between! We laugh at our friends who paid a fortune for their GoPro cameras. Why spend all that money, when equal quality is right here at a fraction the cost? To me, that’s an easy decision!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he Absolutely ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he Absolutely loves it. I was very impressed with all of the attachments that came with the camera, which saved me form having to make any more purchases and allowed him to get right to using it. Plus comes with 2 batteries!! Very impressed with the App and the ability to use the phone to take pictures and see the picture from a remote position.
customer_reviews.author: Pickthesouth

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t what I thought it was.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t as easy to use as I had hoped. Had difficulty downloading video.
customer_reviews.author: ALR

customer_reviews.title: Best Action Camera for the Price is Right!
customer_reviews.text: My very first action camera and it does not disappoint at all! Its awesome, great price and easy to use. I absolutely recommend and will definitely buy future products. The picture/video is clear and all the additional accessories are awesome. Using it everyday for car cam and for any outdoor activities. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 9 year old to play with and make mini action videos with. He loves it and it was definitely worth the price of $40-ish but overall, the picture quality is t that great and the sounds is barely audible. Good buy for kids who have no idea of quality but not a great but for adults or those seeking a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: ToBeAlive

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a real estate agent, but if I were, I would be really glad I invested in this camera. With the fisheye effect, I was able to capture images for my significant other and I to look at later for purchasing a house. I am really looking forward to taking this on vacation and getting some real action shots!! Great Product!!
customer_reviews.author: Breanne Benstead

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely impressed with this camera, considering the price. I used this and a GoPro at the same time and there was not much difference in the quality of photos and/or video footage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a dashcam but haven't used it as such yet. However, my nieces have played with it and must say that the quality of the picture is really good. It also comes with a bunch of different mount attachments and an extra battery which for the price is a real good deal. I just wish that the manual is more thorough as we had to figure out which buttons to press for certain functions. Also, the sound quality is not that good. Overall, a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Seussmaryosep

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not really happy with this camera. Picture and video quality is really bad. The 4k video is 12fps so it is jumpy. The battery also is terrible. I can see why it is cheap but even with being cheap it is not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: DPD22

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 10 and 8 year old sons and they love them. They mount them to their bikes, 4 wheelers or just carry them around the woods and take videos. It is easy to use, easy to set up, and easy to view the footage they have taken. It came with all kinds of accessories to use. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: The functions on the camera are very easy to use and manual does tell everything you need ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera and all the extra bundles came in perfectly as was described. The functions on the camera are very easy to use and manual does tell everything you need to know about it. The picture quality and video quality is what you expect. I have been using the 1080/60fps and am satisfied with it. There's not much more to say. What you pay is what you get and with the price of this camera being affordable, it is a huge plus. Product is great and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter & Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the Cost!
customer_reviews.text: Camera does EVERYTHING I need it to and more. Great pics, audio is clear when you are close. I'm using the camera to build my youtube channel and my brand! #youroutdooradventures
customer_reviews.author: mario meyers

customer_reviews.title: All the reviews are fake, the company says "Give use 5 stars and get a free gift"
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews are fake, the company says "Give use 5 stars and get a free gift" This is NOT a 4k(12MP) camera this is a 4MP camera, then the image is stretched to 4k. The image is very pixelated and ugly. This is not a GoPro beater, this is a good first camera
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Leaps ahead of their competition! And the PRICE! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! We are extremely impressed with this camera. We were so excited that we quickly turned it on and tested it out. The clarity was incredible and it was extremely smooth! The view screen on the back and price made it leaps ahead of the GoPro and Garmin camera. The remote works like a charm and it was incredibly easy to use. We are headed out to Mexico in late January and can't wait to test it out even more! Thanks Akaso for making these incredible cameras affordable and even better then the GoPro's!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!! NOT a 4K camera.. DO NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera last week. This is absolutely not a 4K camera. When on the 4K setting it freezes up and goes fuzzy every 2 seconds. Your only other option is go down to the 1080p and even that is mediocre. On top of this the volume is horrible and I can barely hear my self scream even with the waterproof case off. All these positive reviews are very deceitful and I will certainly return for another budget friendly action camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You are going to like this camera
customer_reviews.text: Really like this camera. I have a gopro and I like this camera better. Use it all day to video my grand daughters softball games. I use a 256 video card and a auxiliary battery. Had to cut out the side of the case for access to plug in the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Kuebler

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Good water resistant the camera quality is okay but not the best and the accessories are decent but half you will probably never use. 720p and 60 fps is your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbly Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my eight-year-old. He absolutely loves it. I am very impressed with the quality of the picture and the build. I love the screen on the back. And the options
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Good quality/lower priced replacement for a Go-Pro
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and I love the fact that it connects wirelessly to my iPhone. Lots of bundled straps and attachments, though for best ease of use it probably needs a selfie stick or something to hold it while you use the remote. I do wish that the wrist remote was waterproof; I thought it was and took it into the water with me only to realize minutes later that I was getting no pictures because the remote was not working. Thankfully the buttons are big and easy to manipulate while in the waterproof case.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Michael A. Eberhard

customer_reviews.title: Only use it 1 time!!!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 hrs of using the remote with the camera it stops working, I thought may be the battery needs to be changed and this is what I saw when I opened it.....RUST!!!! I don’t think this can happened because I use it for only 3hrs. This remote has been used before for months.... I paid money for new items and not old, used and rusted items!!!!
customer_reviews.author: nessrien

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to capture images on outings that I may otherwise miss. It so far has worked perfectly. Also their customer service is excellent. There was a small issue with the waterproof case at first and they quickly resolved the issue with no fuss. I greatly appreciate that. I have since purchased more accessories to further enjoy my cute little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela fleischmann

customer_reviews.title: Great at a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.text: I have used the AKASO about 4 times now. What I'm most happy with is the quality of the wide angle. For a fraction of the price of the big brand, which I did have and broke. I am extremely happy with how it performs. I'm not going to take away a star for it, but I do wish you could add a external battery pack to it. But I'm happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Charlieg

customer_reviews.title: What a great new "toy"
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use as a fixed camera for our Kayak for recording our adventures. It comes with several mounting choices. One worked great for us and will clamp on our mast tube pole. It is tricky to figure out the buttons but once you do, it is easy to navigate. I'm looking forward to trying it for underwater shots too.
customer_reviews.author: Miss G

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with  AKASO EK7000 purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is my first action camera and I couldn't be happier with this purchase. It works better than expected, Incredible at this price with all the accessories. I've rated 4 star because the app does not work well but is something I hope they fix it and gets a little hot when charging the batteries, I suppose that's normal. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We took this camera on our six flags trip to capture our day and we were pleasantly surprised! We didn’t want to spend the crazy money on a GoPro but this camera did the trick! We did use it during our water rides and it didn’t seem to have any issues when wet. Overall the quality isn’t bad. I wouldn’t say the quality of the video is “crisp”, but for the price it was great! Definitely recommend this if your looking for something to capture your adventures without wanting to spend the ridiculous money on something “fancy”
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly G.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old son. Overall quality is good for the price. I didn’t want to spend as much as similar products wanted on an 11 yo. He uses it for video taping while skateboarding and scootering. It’s easy to use. We tested the waterproof feature yesterday and it worked just fine. Overall he’s very happy. Just wish it came with an SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Judi mayerhofer

customer_reviews.title: This camera works great and the videos are high quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great and the videos are high quality! The price is amazing for the value, ease of use and the accessories that come with the camera. The waterproof case survived jumps off the diving board by my 10 year old and 12 year old grandkids at the neighborhood pool. I recommend this camera for those that want a Go Pro type camera and do not want to pay the high price.
customer_reviews.author: PopPop Bray

customer_reviews.title: Great Action Camera with accessories. Mic cannot capture much noise when in waterproof case.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great camera for the price. Videos and images are great!!!. Many different mounts and accessories. Used a 32 gb sd card and it worked great. Using the camera with the water proof case significantly affects the audio recording and its hard to hear any audio during playback that is why I had to give it 4 stars. Using it with the open case was great and the camera's mic captured all surrounding noise. The remote is also very handy. I cannot compare it to the Go Pro because I never owned one but youtube has many videos comparing both cameras but I think for the price, this camera is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter. D

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera in small package
customer_reviews.text: This camera took great pictures but the LCD screen and indicator lights were tough to see. Couple times I thought it was recording video but wasn't cause teh indicator lights are tough to see in daylight. Underwater sots came out fantastic! Remote worked great for taking selfies without stick or holding camera. Burst photos shots were awesome for capturing action shots. Lots of accessories for mounting camera. GoPro knock off but well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: curt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I received a message from a friend telling me to buy this instead of the competition. He was on point! This thing is awesome. Great quality, great durability, comes with everything you need other than maybe a tripod. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, versatility and value
customer_reviews.text: Mostly for when I ride my mountain bike. I previously had a Garmin Virb Elite. While the Akaso does not have all the features of the Garmin most of them I never used. The accessories that come with it plus the remote control made it a no brainer. I may buy another with the touch screen, Can't hurt to have 2.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sirico

customer_reviews.title: Great underwater & wide angle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to get acquainted with a Go-Pro "type" model. I love the wide angle & underwater vids it takes. The battery cover is a little tough to remove & the audio leave a bit to be desired. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value - battery short lived
customer_reviews.text: I too have owned several Go Pro's and after having them fail on more than one vacation I am done! I have a ski mountaineering trip to BC coming up and was hesitant about these "cheaper" action cameras but gave it a shot. I have tested the camera and all seems very legit for the price point! The app for viewing and using with your phone is easy to use; a huge plus! Only bad thing is the battery is very short lived but they do give you TWO so that is good.
customer_reviews.author: Climberbutt

product_meta.title: AKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports Action Camera Ultra HD Waterproof DV Camcorder 12MP 170 Degree Wide Angle (Silver)
feature_bullets: 4K Ultra HD action Camera. Professional 4K 25Fps & 2.7K 30Fps video with 12MP photos at up to 30 frames per second for incredible photos, which is 4 times the resolution of traditional HD cameras.
Wireless wrist remote control sports camera. With a wrist 2.4G remote, you can capture the world in an all-new way. Controlling the camera, framing shots or recording video is convenient.
Longer battery life. AKASO EK7000 action camera comes with 2 rechargeable 1050mAh batteries. Each battery can record up to 90 minutes. No more worry about the recording time for this Action camera.
Built-in Wi-Fi & HDMI, edit & share YOUR action in minutes. Just download App(smart DV) on your phone or tablet and connect with this action camera. Wi-Fi signal ranges up to 10 meters.
100 Feet waterproof camera. AKASO EK7000 is designed to withstand extreme environments, together with durable waterproof case. With the accessories, transform it for indoor and outdoor activities.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,514 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
